O

Order - Class in OrderSubsystem
This Class implements an Order with specific private attributes tied to the Order, as well as mutators and accessor's so the interfaces can work with the object in a flexible way Also added a toString in case for printing purposes.
Order(String, LinkedList<Product>, double, Address, CreditCard, Account) - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.Order
This Constructs an order with a specified Order Id, A List of Products, Sales Total, Address Object, and a Credit Card Object.
Order(LinkedList<Product>, double, Account) - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.Order
Constructs an "unfinished order" this is used in the Order cOllection create order method to create an ORder Object with just the Product List (Copied from the shopping car), Account that's making the order , and the sales total for the order derived from the product lsit.
Order(LinkedList<Product>, double, Address, CreditCard, Account) - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.Order
COnstructs the finished Order after filling the Address and CreditCard object in the makePayment private method of create ORder - It lacks the OrderID passed through the parameter since the ID is automatically generated by the mySQL database.
Order(String, LinkedList<Product>, double, Address, CreditCard, Account, Timestamp) - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.Order
 
OrderCollection - Class in OrderSubsystem
This class Implements the Collection of Orders and the Cart Data Structure It contain the use cases to create an order the Shopping cart use case functions The Make Payment use case involved in the Order payment The cancel order used to get rid of an order that has been created and has not been shipped yet, this will change the objects status to cancelled however it will still be in the viewOrderHistory This class also provides the ShipOrder Use case for the Administrator as well as the viewOrderHistory to view the current users order History.
OrderCollection() - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollection
This is the default constructor for the OrderCollections class it creates the Order Collection for a guest who has not logged in as a User or an Admin.
OrderCollection(String) - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollection
OverLoaded Constructor constructs the Order Collections with an Order History that will be filled by the DB passed into the Constructors
OrderCollectionJDBC - Class in OrderSubsystem
This class is the JDBC Class for the Order management subsystem This class provides the queries for the following methods (use cases) -createOrder -cancelOrder -shipOrder -viewOrderHIstory
OrderCollectionJDBC() - Constructor for class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollectionJDBC
Constructor that establishes the connection to the mySql server through JDBC and the private variables declared above.
orderHistQuery(String) - Method in class OrderSubsystem.OrderCollectionJDBC
Creates the Order History HashMap that will be used to fill the OrderHistory Display for the User when looking at past Orders they have made.
OrderSubsystem - package OrderSubsystem
